channel.title: Black Mesa resources' license
channel.description:
Hi. I've asked the question in [url=https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=493422&postcount=262]Black Mesa is released![/url] thread, but you might have missed it in the large number of posts.
What is the license of Black Mesa resources? Can they be used freely elsewhere?
Thanks.

item.title: Black Mesa resources' license
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
Read the license.txt in your black mesa folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa resources' license
item.dc:creator: striker
item.description:
You might wanna PM cman2k 'bout that. Don’t get you hopes up high. Not all assets will be usable elsewhere.

Read full topic
